languages.text: Группа дерзких охотников за сокровищами совершила налет на легендарное кладбище кораблей, Процессию проклятых. Им удалось вырвать из конвоя погибших судов руины древнего крейсера, и теперь останки славного корабля выставлены на аукцион. Пусть он и не подлежит восстановлению, но все еще представляет из себя гигантскую скалу из пластали и адамантиума.

A band of bold treasure hunters has raided a legendary ship cemetery, the Procession of the Damned. They were able to snatch the ruins of an ancient cruiser from the convoy of shipwrecks, and now the remains of the glorious ship have been put up for auction. Beyond repair though it may be, it is still a giant mountain of plasteel and adamantine.
languages.original_text: Группа дерзких охотников за сокровищами совершила налет на легендарное кладбище кораблей, Процессию проклятых. Им удалось вырвать из конвоя погибших судов руины древнего крейсера, и теперь останки славного корабля выставлены на аукцион. Пусть он и не подлежит восстановлению, но все еще представляет из себя гигантскую скалу из пластали и адамантиума.

Beyond repair though it may be, it is still a giant mountain of plasteel and adamantium.

languages.text: Una banda de atrevidos cazatesoros ha asaltado un legendario cementerio de naves, la Procesión de los Condenados. Pudieron extraer las ruinas de un antiguo crucero del convoy de pecios y ahora los restos de la gloriosa nave se están subastando. Por mucho que la nave sea irreparable, sigue siendo un enorme amasijo de plastiacero y adamantino.
languages.original_text: A band of bold treasure hunters has raided a legendary ship cemetery, the Procession of the Damned. They were able to snatch the ruins of an ancient cruiser from the convoy of shipwrecks, and now the remains of the glorious ship have been put up for auction. Beyond repair though it may be, it is still a giant mountain of plasteel and adamantine.

traits.locale_text: Una banda de atrevidos cazatesoros ha asaltado un legendario cementerio de naves, la Procesión de los Condenados. Pudieron extraer las ruinas de un antiguo crucero del convoy de pecios y ahora los restos de la gloriosa nave se están subastando. Por mucho que la nave sea irreparable, sigue siendo un enorme amasijo de plastiacero y adamantio.

languages.text: Un groupe d'audacieux chasseurs de trésors a pillé un cimetière de vaisseaux légendaire, la Procession des Damnés. Au milieu du convoi d'épaves, ils ont réussi à mettre la main sur la glorieuse carcasse d'un antique croiseur, qu'ils ont ensuite mis aux enchères. Bien qu'il soit définitivement irréparable, il n'en constitue pas moins une montagne de plastacier et d'adamantine.
languages.original_text: A band of bold treasure hunters has raided a legendary ship cemetery, the Procession of the Damned. They were able to snatch the ruins of an ancient cruiser from the convoy of shipwrecks, and now the remains of the glorious ship have been put up for auction. Beyond repair though it may be, it is still a giant mountain of plasteel and adamantine.

traits.locale_text: Un groupe d'audacieux chasseurs de trésors a pillé un cimetière de vaisseaux légendaire, la Procession des Damnés. Au milieu du convoi d'épaves, ils ont réussi à mettre la main sur la glorieuse carcasse d'un antique croiseur, qu'ils ont ensuite mis aux enchères. Bien qu'il soit définitivement irréparable, il n'en constitue pas moins une montagne de plastacier et d'adamantium.

languages.text: 一群胆大包天的猎人突袭了“亡者行军”，传说中的沉船地。他们从众多沉船中，打捞出一艘远古巡洋舰的残骸，将这艘曾经风光无限的庞然大物重新拼凑一番后，送上了拍卖台。尽管这艘船已经不可能再修好了，但它仍旧是一座由塑钢和精金堆成的宝山。
languages.original_text: A band of bold treasure hunters has raided a legendary ship cemetery, the Procession of the Damned. They were able to snatch the ruins of an ancient cruiser from the convoy of shipwrecks, and now the remains of the glorious ship have been put up for auction. Beyond repair though it may be, it is still a giant mountain of plasteel and adamantine.

traits.locale_text: 一群胆大包天的猎人突袭了“亡者行军”，传说中的沉船地。他们从众多沉船中，打捞出一艘远古巡洋舰的残骸，将这艘曾经风光无限的庞然大物重新拼凑一番后，送上了拍卖台。尽管这艘船已经不可能再修好了，但它仍旧是一座由塑钢和精金堆成的宝山。

languages.text: 大胆なトレジャーハンターの一団が、伝説の船の墓地「破滅の船列」を襲撃した。彼らは難破船の船団から古代の巡洋艦の残骸を奪取することに成功し、その栄光の船の残骸がオークションにかけられた。修理不能とはいえ、プラスチールとアダマンチウムの巨大な山であることに変わりはない。
languages.original_text: A band of bold treasure hunters has raided a legendary ship cemetery, the Procession of the Damned. They were able to snatch the ruins of an ancient cruiser from the convoy of shipwrecks, and now the remains of the glorious ship have been put up for auction. Beyond repair though it may be, it is still a giant mountain of plasteel and adamantine.

traits.locale_text: 大胆なトレジャーハンターの一団が、伝説の船の墓地「破滅の船列」を襲撃した。彼らは難破船の船団から古代の巡洋艦の残骸を奪取することに成功し、その栄光の船の残骸がオークションにかけられた。修理不能とはいえ、プラスチールとアダマンチウムの巨大な山であることに変わりはない。

languages.text: Eine Bande kühner Schatzjäger hat einen legendären Schiffsfriedhof geplündert, die Prozession der Verdammten. Sie konnten das Wrack eines uralten Kreuzers aus dem Konvoi der Schiffsleichen bergen, und nun werden die Überreste des glorreichen Schiffs versteigert. Es ist zwar nicht mehr zu reparieren, aber dennoch ein riesiger Berg aus Plaststahl und Adamant.
languages.original_text: A band of bold treasure hunters has raided a legendary ship cemetery, the Procession of the Damned. They were able to snatch the ruins of an ancient cruiser from the convoy of shipwrecks, and now the remains of the glorious ship have been put up for auction. Beyond repair though it may be, it is still a giant mountain of plasteel and adamantine.

Sie konnten das Wrack eines uralten Kreuzers aus dem Konvoi der Schiffsleichen bergen, und nun werden die Überreste des glorreichen Schiffs versteigert. Es ist zwar nicht mehr zu reparieren, aber dennoch ein riesiger Berg aus Plaststahl und Adamantium.

languages.text: Bir grup yürekli ödül avcısı, Lanetliler Kafilesi adıyla tanınan destansı bir gemi mezarlığına baskın düzenlemiş. Gemi enkazlarının arasından antik bir kruvazörün kalıntılarını kapıp kaçmışlar. Görkemli gemiden geriye kalanlarsa açık artırmaya çıkarılmış. Tamir edilecek vaziyette değil ama büyük bir plasçelik ve adamantin yığını olarak değerlendirilebilir.
languages.original_text: A band of bold treasure hunters has raided a legendary ship cemetery, the Procession of the Damned. They were able to snatch the ruins of an ancient cruiser from the convoy of shipwrecks, and now the remains of the glorious ship have been put up for auction. Beyond repair though it may be, it is still a giant mountain of plasteel and adamantine.
